short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to shorten the long URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps to shorten the current browser location URL, stores the URL and can be used to share this shorten URL to others for reference.
These shortened URLs can also be used in any other blogs, posts, documents, etc for reference or with clickable option.
